snippet: Mexico’s attorney general said that a buildup of gas ignited by a spark from a faulty electrical system caused the explosion at the Pemex headquarters last week.
abstract: Mexico Atty Gen Jesus Murillo Karam says buildup of gas ignited by spark from faulty electrical system caused explosion at headquarters of Mexico's state-owned oil company.
lead_paragraph: Mexico’s attorney general said that a buildup of gas ignited by a spark from a faulty electrical system caused the explosion at the Pemex headquarters last week.

headline.seo: Gas Buildup and Spark Blamed in Pemex Blast
headline.main: Gas Buildup and Spark Blamed in Blast
headline.print_headline: Gas Buildup and Spark Blamed in Blast
